 645                                                                                                          
 646     public class RefreshTask extends DBAccess {                                                          
 647         private ChartsData chartsData;                                                                   
 648                                                                                                          
 649         public RefreshTask(String task, Context context) {                                               
 650             super(task, context);                                                                        
 651         }                                                                                                
 652                                                                                                          
 653         @Override                                                                                        
 654         protected void doInBackground(DBHandler db) {                                                    
 655             ChartsHost chartsHost = getChartsHost();                                                     
 656             if (chartsHost != null) {                                                                    
 657                 chartsData = refreshInBackground(chartsHost, db, chartsHost.getDevice());                
 658             } else {                                                                                     
 659                 cancel(true);                                                                            
 660             }                                                                                            
 661         }                                                                                                
 662                                                                                                          
 663         @Override                                                                                        
 664         protected void onPostExecute(Object o) {                                                         
 665             super.onPostExecute(o);                                                                      
 666             FragmentActivity activity = getActivity();                                                   
 667             if (activity != null && !activity.isFinishing() && !activity.isDestroyed()) {                
 668                 updateChartsnUIThread(chartsData);                                                       
 669                 renderCharts();                                                                          
 670             } else {                                                                                     
 671                 LOG.info("Not rendering charts because activity is not available anymore");              
 672             }                                                                                            
 673         }                                                                                                
 674     }                                                                                                    
 675                                                                                                          
 676     protected abstract void updateChartsnUIThread(ChartsData chartsData);                                
 677                                                                                                          
 678     /**                                                                                                  
 679      * Returns true if the date was successfully shifted, and false if the shift                         
 680      * was ignored, e.g. when the to-value is in the future.                                             
 681      *                                                                                                   
 682      * @param from                                                                                       
 683      * @param to                                                                                         
 684      */                                                                                                  
 685     public boolean setDateRange(Date from, Date to) {                                                    
 686         if (from.compareTo(to) > 0) {                                                                    
 687             throw new IllegalArgumentException("Bad date range: " + from + ".." + to);                   
 688         }                                                                                                
 689         Date now = new Date();                                                                           
 690         if (to.after(now)) {                                                                             
 691             return false;                                                                                
 692         }                                                                                                
 693         setStartDate(from);                                                                              
 694         setEndDate(to);                                                                                  
 695         return true;                                                                                     
 696     }                                                                                                    
 697                                                                                                          
 698     protected void updateDateInfo(Date from, Date to) {                                                  
 699         if (from.equals(to)) {                                                                           
 700             getChartsHost().setDateInfo(DateTimeUtils.formatDate(from));                                 
 701         } else {                                                                                         
 702             getChartsHost().setDateInfo(DateTimeUtils.formatDateRange(from, to));                        
 703         }                                                                                                
 704     }                                                                                                    
 705                                                                                                          
 706     protected List<? extends ActivitySample> getSamples(DBHandler db, GBDevice device) {                 
 707         int tsStart = getTSStart();                                                                      
 708         int tsEnd = getTSEnd();                                                                          
 709         List<ActivitySample> samples = (List<ActivitySample>) getSamples(db, device, tsStart, tsEnd);    
 710         ensureStartAndEndSamples(samples, tsStart, tsEnd);                                               
 711 //        List<ActivitySample> samples2 = new ArrayList<>();                                             
 712 //        int min = Math.min(samples.size(), 10);                                                        
 713 //        int min = Math.min(samples.size(), 10);                                                        
 714 //        for (int i = 0; i < min; i++) {                                                                
 715 //            samples2.add(samples.get(i));                                                              
 716 //        }                                                                                              
 717 //        return samples2;                                                                               
 718         return samples;                                                                                  
 719     }                                                                                                    
 720                                                                                                          
 721     protected void ensureStartAndEndSamples(List<ActivitySample> samples, int tsStart, int tsEnd) {      
 722         if (samples == null || samples.isEmpty()) {                                                      
 723             return;                                                                                      
 724         }                                                                                                
 725         ActivitySample lastSample = samples.get(samples.size() - 1);                                     
 726         if (lastSample.getTimestamp() < tsEnd) {                                                         
 727             samples.add(createTrailingActivitySample(lastSample, tsEnd));                                
 728         }                                                                                                
 729                                                                                                          
 730         ActivitySample firstSample = samples.get(0);                                                     
 731         if (firstSample.getTimestamp() > tsStart) {                                                      
 732             samples.add(createTrailingActivitySample(firstSample, tsStart));                             
 733         }                                                                                                
 734     }                                                                                                    
 735                                                                                                          
 736     private ActivitySample createTrailingActivitySample(ActivitySample referenceSample, int timestamp) { 
 737         TrailingActivitySample sample = new TrailingActivitySample();                                    
 738         if (referenceSample instanceof AbstractActivitySample) {                                         
 739             AbstractActivitySample reference = (AbstractActivitySample) referenceSample;                 
 740             sample.setUserId(reference.getUserId());                                                     
 741             sample.setDeviceId(reference.getDeviceId());                                                 
 742             sample.setProvider(reference.getProvider());                                                 
 743         }                                                                                                
 744         sample.setTimestamp(timestamp);                                                                  
 745         return sample;                                                                                   
 746     }                                                                                                    
 747                                                                                                          
 748     private int getTSEnd() {                                                                             
 749         return toTimestamp(getEndDate());                                                                
 750     }                                                                                                    
 751                                                                                                          
 752     private int getTSStart() {                                                                           
 753         return toTimestamp(getStartDate());                                                              
 754     }                                                                                                    
 755                                                                                                          
 756     private int toTimestamp(Date date) {                                                                 
 757         return (int) ((date.getTime() / 1000));                                                          
 758     }

 778     protected static class SampleXLabelFormatter implements IAxisValueFormatter {                        
 779         private final TimestampTranslation tsTranslation;                                                
 780         SimpleDateFormat annotationDateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("HH:mm");                           
 781 //        SimpleDateFormat dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm");                        
 782         Calendar cal = GregorianCalendar.getInstance();                                                  
 783                                                                                                          
 784         public SampleXLabelFormatter(TimestampTranslation tsTranslation) {                               
 785             this.tsTranslation = tsTranslation;                                                          
 786                                                                                                          
 787         }                                                                                                
 788         // TODO: this does not work. Cannot use precomputed labels                                       
 789         @Override                                                                                        
 790         public String getFormattedValue(float value, AxisBase axis) {                                    
 791             cal.clear();                                                                                 
 792             int ts = (int) value;                                                                        
 793             cal.setTimeInMillis(tsTranslation.toOriginalValue(ts) * 1000L);                              
 794             Date date = cal.getTime();                                                                   
 795             String dateString = annotationDateFormat.format(date);                                       
 796             return dateString;                                                                           
 797         }                                                                                                
 798     }                                                                                                    
 799                                                                                                          
 800     protected static class PreformattedXIndexLabelFormatter implements IAxisValueFormatter {             
 801         private ArrayList<String> xLabels;                                                               
 802                                                                                                          
 803         public PreformattedXIndexLabelFormatter(ArrayList<String> xLabels) {                             
 804             this.xLabels = xLabels;                                                                      
 805                                                                                                          
 806         }                                                                                                
 807         @Override                                                                                        
 808         public String getFormattedValue(float value, AxisBase axis) {                                    
 809             int index = (int) value;                                                                     
 810             if (xLabels == null || index >= xLabels.size()) {                                            
 811                 return String.valueOf(value);                                                            
 812             }                                                                                            
 813             return xLabels.get(index);                                                                   
 814         }                                                                                                
 815     }                                                                                                    
 816                                                                                                          
 817     /**                                                                                                  
 818      * Awkward class that helps in translating long timestamp                                            
 819      * values to float (sic!) values. It basically rebases all                                           
 820      * timestamps to a base (the very first) timestamp value.                                            
 821      *                                                                                                   
 822      * It does this so that the large timestamp values can be used                                       
 823      * floating point values, where the mantissa is just 24 bits.                                        
 824      */                                                                                                  
 825     protected static class TimestampTranslation {                                                        
 826         private int tsOffset = -1;                                                                       
 827                                                                                                          
 828         public int shorten(int timestamp) {                                                              
 829             if (tsOffset == -1) {                                                                        
 830                 tsOffset = timestamp;                                                                    
 831                 return 0;                                                                                
 832             }                                                                                            
 833             return timestamp - tsOffset;                                                                 
 834         }                                                                                                
 835                                                                                                          
 836         public int toOriginalValue(int timestamp) {                                                      
 837             if (tsOffset == -1) {                                                                        
 838                 return timestamp;                                                                        
 839             }                                                                                            
 840             return timestamp + tsOffset;                                                                 
 841         }                                                                                                
 842     }                                                                                                    
 843 }

  70 /**                                                                                                      
  71  * A base class fragment to be used with ChartsActivity. The fragment can supply                         
  72  * a title to be displayed in the activity by returning non-null in #getTitle()                          
  73  * Broadcast events can be received by overriding #onReceive(Context,Intent).                            
  74  * The chart can be refreshed by calling #refresh()                                                      
  75  * Implement refreshInBackground(DBHandler, GBDevice) to fetch the samples from the DB,                  
  76  * and add the samples to the chart. The actual rendering, which must be performed in the UI             
  77  * thread, must be done in #renderCharts().                                                              
  78  * Access functionality of the hosting activity with #getHost()                                          
  79  * <p/>                                                                                                  
  80  * The hosting ChartsHost activity provides a section for displaying a date or date range                
  81  * being the basis for the chart, as well as two buttons for moving backwards and forward                
  82  * in time. The date is held by the activity, so that it can be shared by multiple chart                 
  83  * fragments. It is still the responsibility of the (currently visible) chart fragment                   
  84  * to set the desired date in the ChartsActivity via #setDateRange(Date,Date).                           
  85  * The default implementations #handleDatePrev(Date,Date) and #handleDateNext(Date,Date)                 
  86  * shift the date by one day.                                                                            
  87  */                                                                                                      
  88 public abstract class AbstractChartFragment extends AbstractGBFragment {                                 
  89     protected final int ANIM_TIME = 250;                                                                 
  90                                                                                                          
  91     private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(AbstractChartFragment.class);              
  92                                                                                                          
  93     private final Set<String> mIntentFilterActions;                                                      
  94                                                                                                          
  95     private final BroadcastReceiver mReceiver = new BroadcastReceiver() {                                
  96         @Override                                                                                        
  97         public void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                          
  98             AbstractChartFragment.this.onReceive(context, intent);                                       
  99         }                                                                                                
 100     };

 162     protected AbstractChartFragment(String... intentFilterActions) {                                     
 163         mIntentFilterActions = new HashSet<>();                                                          
 164         if (intentFilterActions != null) {                                                               
 165             mIntentFilterActions.addAll(Arrays.asList(intentFilterActions));                             
 166         }                                                                                                
 167         mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.DATE_NEXT);                                                  
 168         mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.DATE_PREV);                                                  
 169         mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.REFRESH);                                                    
 170     }

 180             filter.addAction(action);                                                                    
 181         }                                                                                                
 182         LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getActivity()).registerReceiver(mReceiver, filter);

 230     /**                                                                                                  
 231      * Called when this fragment has been fully scrolled into the activity.

 237     protected void onMadeVisibleInActivity() {                                                           
 238         super.onMadeVisibleInActivity();

 240         if (isChartDirty()) {                                                                            
 241             refresh();                                                                                   
 242         }

 247     }

 249     @Override

 251         super.onDestroy();                                                                               
 252         LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getActivity()).unregisterReceiver(mReceiver);                  
 253     }                                                                                                    
 254                                                                                                          
 255     protected void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                           
 256         String action = intent.getAction();                                                              
 257         if (ChartsHost.REFRESH.equals(action)) {                                                         
 258             refresh();                                                                                   
 259         } else if (ChartsHost.DATE_NEXT.equals(action)) {                                                
 260             handleDateNext(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                                
 261         } else if (ChartsHost.DATE_PREV.equals(action)) {                                                
 262             handleDatePrev(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                                
 263         }                                                                                                
 264     }                                                                                                    
 265                                                                                                          
 266     /**                                                                                                  
 267      * Default implementation shifts the dates by one day, if visible                                    
 268      * and calls #refreshIfVisible().                                                                    
 269      *                                                                                                   
 270      * @param startDate                                                                                  
 271      * @param endDate                                                                                    
 272      */                                                                                                  
 273     protected void handleDatePrev(Date startDate, Date endDate) {                                        
 274         if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                     
 275             if (!shiftDates(startDate, endDate, -1)) {                                                   
 276                 return;                                                                                  
 277             }                                                                                            
 278         }                                                                                                
 279         refreshIfVisible();                                                                              
 280     }                                                                                                    
 281                                                                                                          
 282     /**                                                                                                  
 283      * Default implementation shifts the dates by one day, if visible                                    
 284      * and calls #refreshIfVisible().                                                                    
 285      *                                                                                                   
 286      * @param startDate                                                                                  
 287      * @param endDate                                                                                    
 288      */                                                                                                  
 289     protected void handleDateNext(Date startDate, Date endDate) {                                        
 290         if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                     
 291             if (!shiftDates(startDate, endDate, +1)) {                                                   
 292                 return;                                                                                  
 293             }                                                                                            
 294         }                                                                                                
 295         refreshIfVisible();                                                                              
 296     }                                                                                                    
 297                                                                                                          
 298     protected void refreshIfVisible() {                                                                  
 299         if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                     
 300             refresh();                                                                                   
 301         } else {                                                                                         
 302             mChartDirty = true;                                                                          
 303         }                                                                                                
 304     }                                                                                                    
 305                                                                                                          
 306     /**                                                                                                  
 307      * Shifts the given dates by offset days. offset may be positive or negative.                        
 308      *                                                                                                   
 309      * @param startDate                                                                                  
 310      * @param endDate                                                                                    
 311      * @param offset    a positive or negative number of days to shift the dates                         
 312      * @return true if the shift was successful and false otherwise                                      
 313      */                                                                                                  
 314     protected boolean shiftDates(Date startDate, Date endDate, int offset) {                             
 315         Date newStart = DateTimeUtils.shiftByDays(startDate, offset);                                    
 316         Date newEnd = DateTimeUtils.shiftByDays(endDate, offset);                                        
 317                                                                                                          
 318         return setDateRange(newStart, newEnd);                                                           
 319     }                                                                                                    
 320                                                                                                          
 321     protected Integer getColorFor(int activityKind) {                                                    
 322         switch (activityKind) {                                                                          
 323             case ActivityKind.TYPE_DEEP_SLEEP:                                                           
 324                 return akDeepSleep.color;                                                                
 325             case ActivityKind.TYPE_LIGHT_SLEEP:                                                          
 326                 return akLightSleep.color;                                                               
 327             case ActivityKind.TYPE_ACTIVITY:                                                             
 328                 return akActivity.color;                                                                 
 329         }                                                                                                
 330         return akActivity.color;                                                                         
 331     }

 398     /**                                                                                                  
 399      * This method will invoke a background task to read the data from the                               
 400      * database, analyze it, prepare it for the charts and eventually call                               
 401      * #renderCharts                                                                                     
 402      */                                                                                                  
 403     protected void refresh() {                                                                           
 404         ChartsHost chartsHost = getChartsHost();                                                         
 405         if (chartsHost != null) {                                                                        
 406             if (chartsHost.getDevice() != null) {                                                        
 407                 mChartDirty = false;                                                                     
 408                 updateDateInfo(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                            
 409                 if (refreshTask != null && refreshTask.getStatus() != AsyncTask.Status.FINISHED) {       
 410                     refreshTask.cancel(true);                                                            
 411                 }                                                                                        
 412                 refreshTask = createRefreshTask("Visualizing data", getActivity()).execute();            
 413             }                                                                                            
 414         }                                                                                                
 415     }

 631     protected RefreshTask createRefreshTask(String task, Context context) {

 634                                                                                                          
 635     public class RefreshTask extends DBAccess {                                                          
 636         private ChartsData chartsData;                                                                   
 637                                                                                                          
 638         public RefreshTask(String task, Context context) {                                               
 639             super(task, context);                                                                        
 640         }                                                                                                
 641                                                                                                          
 642         @Override                                                                                        
 643         protected void doInBackground(DBHandler db) {                                                    
 644             ChartsHost chartsHost = getChartsHost();                                                     
 645             if (chartsHost != null) {                                                                    
 646                 chartsData = refreshInBackground(chartsHost, db, chartsHost.getDevice());                
 647             } else {                                                                                     
 648                 cancel(true);                                                                            
 649             }                                                                                            
 650         }                                                                                                
 651                                                                                                          
 652         @Override                                                                                        
 653         protected void onPostExecute(Object o) {                                                         
 654             super.onPostExecute(o);                                                                      
 655             FragmentActivity activity = getActivity();                                                   
 656             if (((activity != null) && (!activity.isFinishing())) && (!activity.isDestroyed())) {        
 657                 updateChartsnUIThread(chartsData);                                                       
 658                 renderCharts();                                                                          
 659             } else {                                                                                     
 660                 LOG.info("Not rendering charts because activity is not available anymore");              
 661             }                                                                                            
 662         }                                                                                                
 663     }                                                                                                    
 664                                                                                                          
 665     protected abstract void updateChartsnUIThread(ChartsData chartsData);                                
 666                                                                                                          
 667     /**                                                                                                  
 668      * Returns true if the date was successfully shifted, and false if the shift                         
 669      * was ignored, e.g. when the to-value is in the future.                                             
 670      *                                                                                                   
 671      * @param from                                                                                       
 672      * @param to                                                                                         
 673      */                                                                                                  
 674     public boolean setDateRange(Date from, Date to) {                                                    
 675         if (from.compareTo(to) > 0) {                                                                    
 676             throw new IllegalArgumentException("Bad date range: " + from + ".." + to);                   
 677         }                                                                                                
 678         Date now = new Date();                                                                           
 679         if (to.after(now)) {                                                                             
 680             return false;                                                                                
 681         }                                                                                                
 682         setStartDate(from);                                                                              
 683         setEndDate(to);                                                                                  
 684         return true;                                                                                     
 685     }                                                                                                    
 686                                                                                                          
 687     protected void updateDateInfo(Date from, Date to) {                                                  
 688         if (from.equals(to)) {                                                                           
 689             getChartsHost().setDateInfo(DateTimeUtils.formatDate(from));                                 
 690         } else {                                                                                         
 691             getChartsHost().setDateInfo(DateTimeUtils.formatDateRange(from, to));                        
 692         }                                                                                                
 693     }                                                                                                    
 694                                                                                                          
 695     protected List<? extends ActivitySample> getSamples(DBHandler db, GBDevice device) {                 
 696         int tsStart = getTSStart();                                                                      
 697         int tsEnd = getTSEnd();                                                                          
 698         List<ActivitySample> samples = (List<ActivitySample>) getSamples(db, device, tsStart, tsEnd);    
 699         ensureStartAndEndSamples(samples, tsStart, tsEnd);                                               
 700     //        List<ActivitySample> samples2 = new ArrayList<>();                                         
 701     //        int min = Math.min(samples.size(), 10);                                                    
 702     //        int min = Math.min(samples.size(), 10);                                                    
 703     //        for (int i = 0; i < min; i++) {                                                            
 704     //            samples2.add(samples.get(i));                                                          
 705     //        }                                                                                          
 706     //        return samples2;                                                                           
 707         return samples;                                                                                  
 708     }                                                                                                    
 709                                                                                                          
 710     protected void ensureStartAndEndSamples(List<ActivitySample> samples, int tsStart, int tsEnd) {      
 711         if (samples == null || samples.isEmpty()) {                                                      
 712             return;                                                                                      
 713         }                                                                                                
 714         ActivitySample lastSample = samples.get(samples.size() - 1);                                     
 715         if (lastSample.getTimestamp() < tsEnd) {                                                         
 716             samples.add(createTrailingActivitySample(lastSample, tsEnd));                                
 717         }                                                                                                
 718                                                                                                          
 719         ActivitySample firstSample = samples.get(0);                                                     
 720         if (firstSample.getTimestamp() > tsStart) {                                                      
 721             samples.add(createTrailingActivitySample(firstSample, tsStart));                             
 722         }                                                                                                
 723     }                                                                                                    
 724                                                                                                          
 725     private ActivitySample createTrailingActivitySample(ActivitySample referenceSample, int timestamp) { 
 726         TrailingActivitySample sample = new TrailingActivitySample();                                    
 727         if (referenceSample instanceof AbstractActivitySample) {                                         
 728             AbstractActivitySample reference = (AbstractActivitySample) referenceSample;                 
 729             sample.setUserId(reference.getUserId());                                                     
 730             sample.setDeviceId(reference.getDeviceId());                                                 
 731             sample.setProvider(reference.getProvider());                                                 
 732         }                                                                                                
 733         sample.setTimestamp(timestamp);                                                                  
 734         return sample;                                                                                   
 735     }                                                                                                    
 736                                                                                                          
 737     private int getTSEnd() {                                                                             
 738         return toTimestamp(getEndDate());                                                                
 739     }                                                                                                    
 740                                                                                                          
 741     private int getTSStart() {                                                                           
 742         return toTimestamp(getStartDate());                                                              
 743     }                                                                                                    
 744                                                                                                          
 745     private int toTimestamp(Date date) {                                                                 
 746         return (int) ((date.getTime() / 1000));                                                          
 747     }

 749     public static class DefaultChartsData<T extends ChartData<?>> extends ChartsData {                   
 750         private final T data;                                                                            
 751                                                                                                          
 752         private IAxisValueFormatter xValueFormatter;                                                     
 753                                                                                                          
 754         public DefaultChartsData(T data, IAxisValueFormatter xValueFormatter) {                          
 755             this.xValueFormatter = xValueFormatter;                                                      
 756             this.data = data;                                                                            
 757         }                                                                                                
 758                                                                                                          
 759         public IAxisValueFormatter getXValueFormatter() {                                                
 760             return xValueFormatter;                                                                      
 761         }                                                                                                
 762                                                                                                          
 763         public T getData() {                                                                             
 764             return data;                                                                                 
 765         }                                                                                                
 766     }

 768     protected static class SampleXLabelFormatter implements IAxisValueFormatter {                        
 769         private final TimestampTranslation tsTranslation;                                                
 770                                                                                                          
 771         SimpleDateFormat annotationDateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("HH:mm");                           
 772                                                                                                          
 773         // SimpleDateFormat dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm");                       
 774         Calendar cal = GregorianCalendar.getInstance();                                                  
 775                                                                                                          
 776         public SampleXLabelFormatter(TimestampTranslation tsTranslation) {                               
 777             this.tsTranslation = tsTranslation;                                                          
 778         }                                                                                                
 779                                                                                                          
 780         // TODO: this does not work. Cannot use precomputed labels                                       
 781         @Override                                                                                        
 782         public String getFormattedValue(float value, AxisBase axis) {                                    
 783             cal.clear();                                                                                 
 784             int ts = ((int) (value));                                                                    
 785             cal.setTimeInMillis(tsTranslation.toOriginalValue(ts) * 1000L);                              
 786             Date date = cal.getTime();                                                                   
 787             String dateString = annotationDateFormat.format(date);                                       
 788             return dateString;                                                                           
 789         }                                                                                                
 790     }                                                                                                    
 791                                                                                                          
 792     protected static class PreformattedXIndexLabelFormatter implements IAxisValueFormatter {             
 793         private ArrayList<String> xLabels;                                                               
 794                                                                                                          
 795         public PreformattedXIndexLabelFormatter(ArrayList<String> xLabels) {                             
 796             this.xLabels = xLabels;                                                                      
 797         }                                                                                                
 798                                                                                                          
 799         @Override                                                                                        
 800         public String getFormattedValue(float value, AxisBase axis) {                                    
 801             int index = ((int) (value));                                                                 
 802             if ((xLabels == null) || (index >= xLabels.size())) {                                        
 803                 return String.valueOf(value);                                                            
 804             }                                                                                            
 805             return xLabels.get(index);                                                                   
 806         }                                                                                                
 807     }                                                                                                    
 808                                                                                                          
 809     /**                                                                                                  
 810      * Awkward class that helps in translating long timestamp                                            
 811      * values to float (sic!) values. It basically rebases all                                           
 812      * timestamps to a base (the very first) timestamp value.                                            
 813      *                                                                                                   
 814      * It does this so that the large timestamp values can be used                                       
 815      * floating point values, where the mantissa is just 24 bits.                                        
 816      */                                                                                                  
 817     protected static class TimestampTranslation {                                                        
 818         private int tsOffset = -1;                                                                       
 819                                                                                                          
 820         public int shorten(int timestamp) {                                                              
 821             if (tsOffset == (-1)) {                                                                      
 822                 tsOffset = timestamp;                                                                    
 823                 return 0;                                                                                
 824             }                                                                                            
 825             return timestamp - tsOffset;                                                                 
 826         }                                                                                                
 827                                                                                                          
 828         public int toOriginalValue(int timestamp) {                                                      
 829             if (tsOffset == (-1)) {                                                                      
 830                 return timestamp;                                                                        
 831             }                                                                                            
 832             return timestamp + tsOffset;                                                                 
 833         }                                                                                                
 834     }                                                                                                    
 835 }
ours vs. base theirs vs. base

  73  /**                                                                                                               
  74   * A base class fragment to be used with ChartsActivity. The fragment can supply                                  
  75   * a title to be displayed in the activity by returning non-null in #getTitle()                                   
  76   * Broadcast events can be received by overriding #onReceive(Context,Intent).                                     
  77   * The chart can be refreshed by calling #refresh()                                                               
  78   * Implement refreshInBackground(DBHandler, GBDevice) to fetch the samples from the DB,                           
  79   * and add the samples to the chart. The actual rendering, which must be performed in the UI                      
  80   * thread, must be done in #renderCharts().                                                                       
  81   * Access functionality of the hosting activity with #getHost()                                                   
  82   * <p/>                                                                                                           
  83   * The hosting ChartsHost activity provides a section for displaying a date or date range                         
  84   * being the basis for the chart, as well as two buttons for moving backwards and forward                         
  85   * in time. The date is held by the activity, so that it can be shared by multiple chart                          
  86   * fragments. It is still the responsibility of the (currently visible) chart fragment                            
  87   * to set the desired date in the ChartsActivity via #setDateRange(Date,Date).                                    
  88   * The default implementations #handleDatePrev(Date,Date) and #handleDateNext(Date,Date)                          
  89   * shift the date by one day.                                                                                     
  90   */                                                                                                               
  91  public abstract class AbstractChartFragment extends AbstractGBFragment {                                          
  92      protected final int ANIM_TIME = 250;                                                                          
  93                                                                                                                    
  94      private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(AbstractChartFragment.class);                       
  95                                                                                                                    
  96      private final Set<String> mIntentFilterActions;                                                               
  97      private final BroadcastReceiver mReceiver = new BroadcastReceiver() {                                         
  98          @Override                                                                                                 
  99          public void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                                   
 100              AbstractChartFragment.this.onReceive(context, intent);                                                
 101          }                                                                                                         
 102      };

 149      protected AbstractChartFragment(String... intentFilterActions) {                                              
 150          mIntentFilterActions = new HashSet<>();                                                                   
 151          if (intentFilterActions != null) {                                                                        
 152              mIntentFilterActions.addAll(Arrays.asList(intentFilterActions));                                      
 153          }                                                                                                         
 154          mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.DATE_NEXT);                                                           
 155          mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.DATE_PREV);                                                           
 156          mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.REFRESH);                                                             
 157      }

 165          IntentFilter filter = new IntentFilter();                                                                 
 166          for (String action : mIntentFilterActions) {                                                              
 167              filter.addAction(action);                                                                             
 168          }                                                                                                         
 169          LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getActivity()).registerReceiver(mReceiver, filter);                     
 170      }

 239          LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getActivity()).unregisterReceiver(mReceiver);

 241                                                                                                                    
 242      protected void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                                    
 243          String action = intent.getAction();                                                                       
 244          if (ChartsHost.REFRESH.equals(action)) {                                                                  
 245              refresh();                                                                                            
 246          } else if (ChartsHost.DATE_NEXT.equals(action)) {                                                         
 247              handleDateNext(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                                         
 248          } else if (ChartsHost.DATE_PREV.equals(action)) {                                                         
 249              handleDatePrev(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                                         
 250          }                                                                                                         
 251      }                                                                                                             
 252                                                                                                                    
 253      /**                                                                                                           
 254       * Default implementation shifts the dates by one day, if visible                                             
 255       * and calls #refreshIfVisible().                                                                             
 256       *                                                                                                            
 257       * @param startDate                                                                                           
 258       * @param endDate                                                                                             
 259       */                                                                                                           
 260      protected void handleDatePrev(Date startDate, Date endDate) {                                                 
 261          if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                              
 262              if (!shiftDates(startDate, endDate, -1)) {                                                            
 263                  return;                                                                                           
 264              }                                                                                                     
 265          }                                                                                                         
 266          refreshIfVisible();                                                                                       
 267      }                                                                                                             
 268                                                                                                                    
 269      /**                                                                                                           
 270       * Default implementation shifts the dates by one day, if visible                                             
 271       * and calls #refreshIfVisible().                                                                             
 272       *                                                                                                            
 273       * @param startDate                                                                                           
 274       * @param endDate                                                                                             
 275       */                                                                                                           
 276      protected void handleDateNext(Date startDate, Date endDate) {                                                 
 277          if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                              
 278              if (!shiftDates(startDate, endDate, +1)) {                                                            
 279                  return;                                                                                           
 280              }                                                                                                     
 281          }                                                                                                         
 282          refreshIfVisible();                                                                                       
 283      }                                                                                                             
 284                                                                                                                    
 285      protected void refreshIfVisible() {                                                                           
 286          if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                              
 287              refresh();                                                                                            
 288          } else {                                                                                                  
 289              mChartDirty = true;                                                                                   
 290          }                                                                                                         
 291      }                                                                                                             
 292                                                                                                                    
 293      /**                                                                                                           
 294       * Shifts the given dates by offset days. offset may be positive or negative.                                 
 295       *                                                                                                            
 296       * @param startDate                                                                                           
 297       * @param endDate                                                                                             
 298       * @param offset    a positive or negative number of days to shift the dates                                  
 299       * @return true if the shift was successful and false otherwise                                               
 300       */                                                                                                           
 301      protected boolean shiftDates(Date startDate, Date endDate, int offset) {                                      
 302          Date newStart = DateTimeUtils.shiftByDays(startDate, offset);                                             
 303          Date newEnd = DateTimeUtils.shiftByDays(endDate, offset);                                                 
 304                                                                                                                    
 305          return setDateRange(newStart, newEnd);                                                                    
 306      }

 308      protected Integer getColorFor(int activityKind) {                                                             
 309          switch (activityKind) {                                                                                   
 310              case ActivityKind.TYPE_DEEP_SLEEP:                                                                    
 311                  return akDeepSleep.color;                                                                         
 312              case ActivityKind.TYPE_LIGHT_SLEEP:                                                                   
 313                  return akLightSleep.color;                                                                        
 314              case ActivityKind.TYPE_ACTIVITY:                                                                      
 315                  return akActivity.color;                                                                          
 316          }                                                                                                         
 317          return akActivity.color;                                                                                  
 318      }
