 349      protected void configureChartDefaults(Chart<?> chart) {                                                       
 350          chart.getXAxis().setValueFormatter(new TimestampValueFormatter());                                        
 351          chart.getDescription().setText("");                                                                       
 352                                                                                                                    
 353          // if enabled, the chart will always start at zero on the y-axis                                          
 354          chart.setNoDataText(getString(R.string.chart_no_data_synchronize));                                       
 355                                                                                                                    
 356          // disable value highlighting                                                                             
 357          chart.setHighlightPerTapEnabled(false);                                                                   
 358                                                                                                                    
 359          // enable touch gestures                                                                                  
 360          chart.setTouchEnabled(true);                                                                              
 361                                                                                                                    
 362  // commented out: this has weird bugs/sideeffects at least on WeekStepsCharts                                     
 363  // where only the first Day-label is drawn, because AxisRenderer.computeAxisValues(float,float)                   
 364  // appears to have an overflow when calculating 'n' (number of entries)                                           
 365  //        chart.getXAxis().setGranularity(60*5);                                                                  
 366                                                                                                                    
 367          setupLegend(chart);                                                                                       
 368      }                                                                                                             
 369                                                                                                                    
 370      protected void configureBarLineChartDefaults(BarLineChartBase<?> chart) {                                     
 371          configureChartDefaults(chart);                                                                            
 372          if (chart instanceof BarChart) {                                                                          
 373              ((BarChart) chart).setFitBars(true);                                                                  
 374          }                                                                                                         
 375                                                                                                                    
 376          // enable scaling and dragging                                                                            
 377          chart.setDragEnabled(true);                                                                               
 378          chart.setScaleEnabled(true);                                                                              
 379                                                                                                                    
 380          // if disabled, scaling can be done on x- and y-axis separately                                           
 381  //        chart.setPinchZoom(true);                                                                               
 382                                                                                                                    
 383          chart.setDrawGridBackground(false);                                                                       
 384      }                                                                                                             
 385                                                                                                                    
 386      /**                                                                                                           
 387       * This method will invoke a background task to read the data from the                                        
 388       * database, analyze it, prepare it for the charts and eventually call                                        
 389       * #renderCharts                                                                                              
 390       */                                                                                                           
 391      protected void refresh() {                                                                                    
 392          ChartsHost chartsHost = getChartsHost();                                                                  
 393          if (chartsHost != null) {                                                                                 
 394              if (chartsHost.getDevice() != null) {                                                                 
 395                  mChartDirty = false;                                                                              
 396                  updateDateInfo(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                                     
 397                  if (refreshTask != null && refreshTask.getStatus() != AsyncTask.Status.FINISHED) {                
 398                      refreshTask.cancel(true);                                                                     
 399                  }                                                                                                 
 400                  refreshTask = createRefreshTask("Visualizing data", getActivity()).execute();                     
 401              }                                                                                                     
 402          }                                                                                                         
 403      }                                                                                                             
 404                                                                                                                    
 405      /**                                                                                                           
 406       * This method reads the data from the database, analyzes and prepares it for                                 
 407       * the charts. This will be called from a background task, so there must not be                               
 408       * any UI access. #updateChartsInUIThread and #renderCharts will be automatically called after this method.   
 409       */                                                                                                           
 410      protected abstract ChartsData refreshInBackground(ChartsHost chartsHost, DBHandler db, GBDevice device);      
 411                                                                                                                    
 412      /**                                                                                                           
 413       * Triggers the actual (re-) rendering of the chart.                                                          
 414       * Always called from the UI thread.                                                                          
 415       */                                                                                                           
 416      protected abstract void renderCharts();                                                                       
 417                                                                                                                    
 418      protected DefaultChartsData<LineData> refresh(GBDevice gbDevice, List<? extends ActivitySample> samples) {    
 419  //        Calendar cal = GregorianCalendar.getInstance();                                                         
 420  //        cal.clear();                                                                                            
 421          TimestampTranslation tsTranslation = new TimestampTranslation();                                          
 422  //        Date date;                                                                                              
 423  //        String dateStringFrom = "";                                                                             
 424  //        String dateStringTo = "";                                                                               
 425  //        ArrayList<String> xLabels = null;                                                                       
 426                                                                                                                    
 427          LOG.info("" + getTitle() + ": number of samples:" + samples.size());                                      
 428          LineData lineData;                                                                                        
 429          if (samples.size() > 1) {                                                                                 
 430              boolean annotate = true;                                                                              
 431              boolean use_steps_as_movement;                                                                        
 432                                                                                                                    
 433              int last_type = ActivityKind.TYPE_UNKNOWN;                                                            
 434                                                                                                                    
 435              int numEntries = samples.size();                                                                      
 436              List<Entry> activityEntries = new ArrayList<>(numEntries);                                            
 437              List<Entry> deepSleepEntries = new ArrayList<>(numEntries);                                           
 438              List<Entry> lightSleepEntries = new ArrayList<>(numEntries);                                          
 439              List<Entry> notWornEntries = new ArrayList<>(numEntries);                                             
 440              boolean hr = supportsHeartrate(gbDevice);                                                             
 441              List<Entry> heartrateEntries = hr ? new ArrayList<Entry>(numEntries) : null;                          
 442 +            List<Integer> colors = new ArrayList<>(numEntries); // this is kinda inefficient...                   
 443              int lastHrSampleIndex = -1;                                                                           
 444                                                                                                                    
 445              for (int i = 0; i < numEntries; i++) {                                                                
 446                  ActivitySample sample = samples.get(i);                                                           
 447                  int type = sample.getKind();                                                                      
 448                  int ts = tsTranslation.shorten(sample.getTimestamp());                                            
 449                                                                                                                    
 450  //                System.out.println(ts);                                                                         
 451  //                ts = i;                                                                                         
 452                  // determine start and end dates                                                                  
 453  //                if (i == 0) {                                                                                   
 454  //                    cal.setTimeInMillis(ts * 1000L); // make sure it's converted to long                        
 455  //                    date = cal.getTime();                                                                       
 456  //                    dateStringFrom = dateFormat.format(date);                                                   
 457  //                } else if (i == samples.size() - 1) {                                                           
 458  //                    cal.setTimeInMillis(ts * 1000L); // same here                                               
 459  //                    date = cal.getTime();                                                                       
 460  //                    dateStringTo = dateFormat.format(date);                                                     
 461  //                }                                                                                               
 462                                                                                                                    
 463                  float movement = sample.getIntensity();                                                           
 464                                                                                                                    
 465                  float value = movement;                                                                           
 466                  switch (type) {                                                                                   
 467                      case ActivityKind.TYPE_DEEP_SLEEP:                                                            
 468                          if (last_type != type) { //FIXME: this is ugly but it works (repeated in each case)       
 469                              deepSleepEntries.add(createLineEntry(0, ts - 1));                                     
 470                                                                                                                    
 471                              lightSleepEntries.add(createLineEntry(0, ts));                                        
 472                              notWornEntries.add(createLineEntry(0, ts));                                           
 473                              activityEntries.add(createLineEntry(0, ts));                                          
 474                          }                                                                                         
 475                          deepSleepEntries.add(createLineEntry(value + SleepUtils.Y_VALUE_DEEP_SLEEP, ts));         
 476                          break;

 641          return new RefreshTask(task, context);

 643                                                                                                                    
 644      public class RefreshTask extends DBAccess {                                                                   
 645          private ChartsData chartsData;                                                                            
 646                                                                                                                    
 647          public RefreshTask(String task, Context context) {                                                        
 648              super(task, context);                                                                                 
 649          }                                                                                                         
 650                                                                                                                    
 651          @Override                                                                                                 
 652          protected void doInBackground(DBHandler db) {                                                             
 653              ChartsHost chartsHost = getChartsHost();                                                              
 654              if (chartsHost != null) {                                                                             
 655                  chartsData = refreshInBackground(chartsHost, db, chartsHost.getDevice());                         
 656              } else {                                                                                              
 657                  cancel(true);                                                                                     
 658              }                                                                                                     
 659          }                                                                                                         
 660                                                                                                                    
 661          @Override                                                                                                 
 662          protected void onPostExecute(Object o) {                                                                  
 663              super.onPostExecute(o);                                                                               
 664              FragmentActivity activity = getActivity();                                                            
 665              if (activity != null && !activity.isFinishing() && !activity.isDestroyed()) {                         
 666                  updateChartsnUIThread(chartsData);                                                                
 667                  renderCharts();                                                                                   
 668              } else {                                                                                              
 669                  LOG.info("Not rendering charts because activity is not available anymore");                       
 670              }                                                                                                     
 671          }                                                                                                         
 672      }                                                                                                             
 673                                                                                                                    
 674      protected abstract void updateChartsnUIThread(ChartsData chartsData);                                         
 675                                                                                                                    
 676      /**                                                                                                           
 677       * Returns true if the date was successfully shifted, and false if the shift                                  
 678       * was ignored, e.g. when the to-value is in the future.                                                      
 679       *                                                                                                            
 680       * @param from                                                                                                
 681       * @param to                                                                                                  
 682       */                                                                                                           
 683      public boolean setDateRange(Date from, Date to) {                                                             
 684          if (from.compareTo(to) > 0) {                                                                             
 685              throw new IllegalArgumentException("Bad date range: " + from + ".." + to);                            
 686          }                                                                                                         
 687          Date now = new Date();                                                                                    
 688          if (to.after(now)) {                                                                                      
 689              return false;                                                                                         
 690          }                                                                                                         
 691          setStartDate(from);                                                                                       
 692          setEndDate(to);                                                                                           
 693          return true;                                                                                              
 694      }                                                                                                             
 695                                                                                                                    
 696      protected void updateDateInfo(Date from, Date to) {                                                           
 697          if (from.equals(to)) {                                                                                    
 698              getChartsHost().setDateInfo(DateTimeUtils.formatDate(from));                                          
 699          } else {                                                                                                  
 700              getChartsHost().setDateInfo(DateTimeUtils.formatDateRange(from, to));                                 
 701          }                                                                                                         
 702      }                                                                                                             
 703                                                                                                                    
 704      protected List<? extends ActivitySample> getSamples(DBHandler db, GBDevice device) {                          
 705          int tsStart = getTSStart();                                                                               
 706          int tsEnd = getTSEnd();                                                                                   
 707          List<ActivitySample> samples = (List<ActivitySample>) getSamples(db, device, tsStart, tsEnd);             
 708          ensureStartAndEndSamples(samples, tsStart, tsEnd);                                                        
 709  //        List<ActivitySample> samples2 = new ArrayList<>();                                                      
 710  //        int min = Math.min(samples.size(), 10);                                                                 
 711  //        int min = Math.min(samples.size(), 10);                                                                 
 712  //        for (int i = 0; i < min; i++) {                                                                         
 713  //            samples2.add(samples.get(i));                                                                       
 714  //        }                                                                                                       
 715  //        return samples2;                                                                                        
 716          return samples;                                                                                           
 717      }                                                                                                             
 718                                                                                                                    
 719      protected void ensureStartAndEndSamples(List<ActivitySample> samples, int tsStart, int tsEnd) {               
 720          if (samples == null || samples.isEmpty()) {                                                               
 721              return;                                                                                               
 722          }                                                                                                         
 723          ActivitySample lastSample = samples.get(samples.size() - 1);                                              
 724          if (lastSample.getTimestamp() < tsEnd) {                                                                  
 725              samples.add(createTrailingActivitySample(lastSample, tsEnd));                                         
 726          }                                                                                                         
 727                                                                                                                    
 728          ActivitySample firstSample = samples.get(0);                                                              
 729          if (firstSample.getTimestamp() > tsStart) {                                                               
 730              samples.add(createTrailingActivitySample(firstSample, tsStart));                                      
 731          }                                                                                                         
 732      }                                                                                                             
 733                                                                                                                    
 734      private ActivitySample createTrailingActivitySample(ActivitySample referenceSample, int timestamp) {          
 735          TrailingActivitySample sample = new TrailingActivitySample();                                             
 736          if (referenceSample instanceof AbstractActivitySample) {                                                  
 737              AbstractActivitySample reference = (AbstractActivitySample) referenceSample;                          
 738              sample.setUserId(reference.getUserId());                                                              
 739              sample.setDeviceId(reference.getDeviceId());                                                          
 740              sample.setProvider(reference.getProvider());                                                          
 741          }                                                                                                         
 742          sample.setTimestamp(timestamp);                                                                           
 743          return sample;                                                                                            
 744      }                                                                                                             
 745                                                                                                                    
 746      private int getTSEnd() {                                                                                      
 747          return toTimestamp(getEndDate());                                                                         
 748      }                                                                                                             
 749                                                                                                                    
 750      private int getTSStart() {                                                                                    
 751          return toTimestamp(getStartDate());                                                                       
 752      }                                                                                                             
 753                                                                                                                    
 754      private int toTimestamp(Date date) {                                                                          
 755          return (int) ((date.getTime() / 1000));                                                                   
 756      }

 776      protected static class SampleXLabelFormatter implements IAxisValueFormatter {                                 
 777          private final TimestampTranslation tsTranslation;                                                         
 778          SimpleDateFormat annotationDateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("HH:mm");                                    
 779  //        SimpleDateFormat dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm");                                 
 780          Calendar cal = GregorianCalendar.getInstance();                                                           
 781                                                                                                                    
 782          public SampleXLabelFormatter(TimestampTranslation tsTranslation) {                                        
 783              this.tsTranslation = tsTranslation;                                                                   
 784                                                                                                                    
 785          }                                                                                                         
 786          // TODO: this does not work. Cannot use precomputed labels                                                
 787          @Override                                                                                                 
 788          public String getFormattedValue(float value, AxisBase axis) {                                             
 789              cal.clear();                                                                                          
 790              int ts = (int) value;                                                                                 
 791              cal.setTimeInMillis(tsTranslation.toOriginalValue(ts) * 1000L);                                       
 792              Date date = cal.getTime();                                                                            
 793              String dateString = annotationDateFormat.format(date);                                                
 794              return dateString;                                                                                    
 795          }                                                                                                         
 796      }

 798      protected static class PreformattedXIndexLabelFormatter implements IAxisValueFormatter {                      
 799          private ArrayList<String> xLabels;                                                                        
 800                                                                                                                    
 801          public PreformattedXIndexLabelFormatter(ArrayList<String> xLabels) {                                      
 802              this.xLabels = xLabels;                                                                               
 803                                                                                                                    
 804          }                                                                                                         
 805          @Override                                                                                                 
 806          public String getFormattedValue(float value, AxisBase axis) {                                             
 807              int index = (int) value;                                                                              
 808              if (xLabels == null || index >= xLabels.size()) {                                                     
 809                  return String.valueOf(value);                                                                     
 810              }                                                                                                     
 811              return xLabels.get(index);                                                                            
 812          }                                                                                                         
 813      }                                                                                                             
 814                                                                                                                    
 815      /**                                                                                                           
 816       * Awkward class that helps in translating long timestamp                                                     
 817       * values to float (sic!) values. It basically rebases all                                                    
 818       * timestamps to a base (the very first) timestamp value.                                                     
 819       *                                                                                                            
 820       * It does this so that the large timestamp values can be used                                                
 821       * floating point values, where the mantissa is just 24 bits.                                                 
 822       */                                                                                                           
 823      protected static class TimestampTranslation {                                                                 
 824          private int tsOffset = -1;                                                                                
 825                                                                                                                    
 826          public int shorten(int timestamp) {                                                                       
 827              if (tsOffset == -1) {                                                                                 
 828                  tsOffset = timestamp;                                                                             
 829                  return 0;                                                                                         
 830              }                                                                                                     
 831              return timestamp - tsOffset;                                                                          
 832          }                                                                                                         
 833                                                                                                                    
 834          public int toOriginalValue(int timestamp) {                                                               
 835              if (tsOffset == -1) {                                                                                 
 836                  return timestamp;                                                                                 
 837              }                                                                                                     
 838              return timestamp + tsOffset;                                                                          
 839          }                                                                                                         
 840      }

  74  /**                                                                                                               
  75   * A base class fragment to be used with ChartsActivity. The fragment can supply                                  
  76   * a title to be displayed in the activity by returning non-null in #getTitle()                                   
  77   * Broadcast events can be received by overriding #onReceive(Context,Intent).                                     
  78   * The chart can be refreshed by calling #refresh()                                                               
  79   * Implement refreshInBackground(DBHandler, GBDevice) to fetch the samples from the DB,                           
  80   * and add the samples to the chart. The actual rendering, which must be performed in the UI                      
  81   * thread, must be done in #renderCharts().                                                                       
  82   * Access functionality of the hosting activity with #getHost()                                                   
  83   * <p/>                                                                                                           
  84   * The hosting ChartsHost activity provides a section for displaying a date or date range                         
  85   * being the basis for the chart, as well as two buttons for moving backwards and forward                         
  86   * in time. The date is held by the activity, so that it can be shared by multiple chart                          
  87   * fragments. It is still the responsibility of the (currently visible) chart fragment                            
  88   * to set the desired date in the ChartsActivity via #setDateRange(Date,Date).                                    
  89   * The default implementations #handleDatePrev(Date,Date) and #handleDateNext(Date,Date)                          
  90   * shift the date by one day.                                                                                     
  91   */                                                                                                               
  92  public abstract class AbstractChartFragment extends AbstractGBFragment {                                          
  93      protected final int ANIM_TIME = 250;                                                                          
  94                                                                                                                    
  95      private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(AbstractChartFragment.class);                       
  96                                                                                                                    
  97      private final Set<String> mIntentFilterActions;                                                               
  98      private final BroadcastReceiver mReceiver = new BroadcastReceiver() {                                         
  99          @Override                                                                                                 
 100          public void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                                   
 101              AbstractChartFragment.this.onReceive(context, intent);                                                
 102          }                                                                                                         
 103      };                                                                                                            
 104      private boolean mChartDirty = true;                                                                           
 105      private AsyncTask refreshTask;

 108          return mChartDirty;                                                                                       
 109      }

 114      public boolean supportsHeartrate(GBDevice device) {                                                           
 115          DeviceCoordinator coordinator = DeviceHelper.getInstance().getCoordinator(device);                        
 116          return coordinator != null && coordinator.supportsHeartRateMeasurement(device);                           
 117      }

 150      protected AbstractChartFragment(String... intentFilterActions) {                                              
 151          mIntentFilterActions = new HashSet<>();                                                                   
 152          if (intentFilterActions != null) {                                                                        
 153              mIntentFilterActions.addAll(Arrays.asList(intentFilterActions));                                      
 154          }                                                                                                         
 155          mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.DATE_NEXT);                                                           
 156          mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.DATE_PREV);                                                           
 157          mIntentFilterActions.add(ChartsHost.REFRESH);                                                             
 158      }

 160      @Override                                                                                                     
 161      public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {                                                             
 162          super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);                                                                       
 163                                                                                                                    
 164          init();                                                                                                   
 165                                                                                                                    
 166          IntentFilter filter = new IntentFilter();                                                                 
 167          for (String action : mIntentFilterActions) {                                                              
 168              filter.addAction(action);                                                                             
 169          }                                                                                                         
 170          LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getActivity()).registerReceiver(mReceiver, filter);                     
 171      }

 218      /**                                                                                                           
 219       * Called when this fragment has been fully scrolled into the activity.                                       
 220       *                                                                                                            
 221       * @see #isVisibleInActivity()                                                                                
 222       * @see #onMadeInvisibleInActivity()                                                                          
 223       */                                                                                                           
 224      @Override                                                                                                     
 225      protected void onMadeVisibleInActivity() {                                                                    
 226          super.onMadeVisibleInActivity();                                                                          
 227          showDateBar(true);                                                                                        
 228          if (isChartDirty()) {                                                                                     
 229              refresh();                                                                                            
 230          }                                                                                                         
 231      }

 233      protected void showDateBar(boolean show) {                                                                    
 234          getChartsHost().getDateBar().setVisibility(show ? View.VISIBLE : View.INVISIBLE);                         
 235      }                                                                                                             
 236                                                                                                                    
 237      @Override                                                                                                     
 238      public void onDestroy() {                                                                                     
 239          super.onDestroy();                                                                                        
 240          LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getActivity()).unregisterReceiver(mReceiver);                           
 241      }                                                                                                             
 242                                                                                                                    
 243      protected void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                                    
 244          String action = intent.getAction();                                                                       
 245          if (ChartsHost.REFRESH.equals(action)) {                                                                  
 246              refresh();                                                                                            
 247          } else if (ChartsHost.DATE_NEXT.equals(action)) {                                                         
 248              handleDateNext(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                                         
 249          } else if (ChartsHost.DATE_PREV.equals(action)) {                                                         
 250              handleDatePrev(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                                         
 251          }                                                                                                         
 252      }                                                                                                             
 253                                                                                                                    
 254      /**                                                                                                           
 255       * Default implementation shifts the dates by one day, if visible                                             
 256       * and calls #refreshIfVisible().                                                                             
 257       *                                                                                                            
 258       * @param startDate                                                                                           
 259       * @param endDate                                                                                             
 260       */                                                                                                           
 261      protected void handleDatePrev(Date startDate, Date endDate) {                                                 
 262          if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                              
 263              if (!shiftDates(startDate, endDate, -1)) {                                                            
 264                  return;                                                                                           
 265              }                                                                                                     
 266          }                                                                                                         
 267          refreshIfVisible();                                                                                       
 268      }                                                                                                             
 269                                                                                                                    
 270      /**                                                                                                           
 271       * Default implementation shifts the dates by one day, if visible                                             
 272       * and calls #refreshIfVisible().                                                                             
 273       *                                                                                                            
 274       * @param startDate                                                                                           
 275       * @param endDate                                                                                             
 276       */                                                                                                           
 277      protected void handleDateNext(Date startDate, Date endDate) {                                                 
 278          if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                              
 279              if (!shiftDates(startDate, endDate, +1)) {                                                            
 280                  return;                                                                                           
 281              }                                                                                                     
 282          }                                                                                                         
 283          refreshIfVisible();                                                                                       
 284      }                                                                                                             
 285                                                                                                                    
 286      protected void refreshIfVisible() {                                                                           
 287          if (isVisibleInActivity()) {                                                                              
 288              refresh();                                                                                            
 289          } else {                                                                                                  
 290              mChartDirty = true;                                                                                   
 291          }                                                                                                         
 292      }                                                                                                             
 293                                                                                                                    
 294      /**                                                                                                           
 295       * Shifts the given dates by offset days. offset may be positive or negative.                                 
 296       *                                                                                                            
 297       * @param startDate                                                                                           
 298       * @param endDate                                                                                             
 299       * @param offset    a positive or negative number of days to shift the dates                                  
 300       * @return true if the shift was successful and false otherwise                                               
 301       */                                                                                                           
 302      protected boolean shiftDates(Date startDate, Date endDate, int offset) {                                      
 303          Date newStart = DateTimeUtils.shiftByDays(startDate, offset);                                             
 304          Date newEnd = DateTimeUtils.shiftByDays(endDate, offset);                                                 
 305                                                                                                                    
 306          return setDateRange(newStart, newEnd);                                                                    
 307      }                                                                                                             
 308                                                                                                                    
 309      protected Integer getColorFor(int activityKind) {                                                             
 310          switch (activityKind) {                                                                                   
 311              case ActivityKind.TYPE_DEEP_SLEEP:                                                                    
 312                  return akDeepSleep.color;                                                                         
 313              case ActivityKind.TYPE_LIGHT_SLEEP:                                                                   
 314                  return akLightSleep.color;                                                                        
 315              case ActivityKind.TYPE_ACTIVITY:                                                                      
 316                  return akActivity.color;                                                                          
 317          }                                                                                                         
 318          return akActivity.color;                                                                                  
 319      }

 350      protected void configureChartDefaults(Chart<?> chart) {                                                       
 351          chart.getXAxis().setValueFormatter(new TimestampValueFormatter());                                        
 352          chart.getDescription().setText("");                                                                       
 353                                                                                                                    
 354          // if enabled, the chart will always start at zero on the y-axis                                          
 355          chart.setNoDataText(getString(R.string.chart_no_data_synchronize));                                       
 356                                                                                                                    
 357          // disable value highlighting                                                                             
 358          chart.setHighlightPerTapEnabled(false);                                                                   
 359                                                                                                                    
 360          // enable touch gestures                                                                                  
 361          chart.setTouchEnabled(true);                                                                              
 362                                                                                                                    
 363  // commented out: this has weird bugs/sideeffects at least on WeekStepsCharts                                     
 364  // where only the first Day-label is drawn, because AxisRenderer.computeAxisValues(float,float)                   
 365  // appears to have an overflow when calculating 'n' (number of entries)                                           
 366  //        chart.getXAxis().setGranularity(60*5);                                                                  
 367                                                                                                                    
 368          setupLegend(chart);                                                                                       
 369      }                                                                                                             
 370                                                                                                                    
 371      protected void configureBarLineChartDefaults(BarLineChartBase<?> chart) {                                     
 372          configureChartDefaults(chart);                                                                            
 373          if (chart instanceof BarChart) {                                                                          
 374              ((BarChart) chart).setFitBars(true);                                                                  
 375          }                                                                                                         
 376                                                                                                                    
 377          // enable scaling and dragging                                                                            
 378          chart.setDragEnabled(true);                                                                               
 379          chart.setScaleEnabled(true);                                                                              
 380                                                                                                                    
 381          // if disabled, scaling can be done on x- and y-axis separately                                           
 382  //        chart.setPinchZoom(true);                                                                               
 383                                                                                                                    
 384          chart.setDrawGridBackground(false);                                                                       
 385      }                                                                                                             
 386                                                                                                                    
 387      /**                                                                                                           
 388       * This method will invoke a background task to read the data from the                                        
 389       * database, analyze it, prepare it for the charts and eventually call                                        
 390       * #renderCharts                                                                                              
 391       */                                                                                                           
 392      protected void refresh() {                                                                                    
 393          ChartsHost chartsHost = getChartsHost();                                                                  
 394          if (chartsHost != null) {                                                                                 
 395              if (chartsHost.getDevice() != null) {                                                                 
 396                  mChartDirty = false;                                                                              
 397                  updateDateInfo(getStartDate(), getEndDate());                                                     
 398                  if (refreshTask != null && refreshTask.getStatus() != AsyncTask.Status.FINISHED) {                
 399                      refreshTask.cancel(true);                                                                     
 400                  }                                                                                                 
 401                  refreshTask = createRefreshTask("Visualizing data", getActivity()).execute();                     
 402              }                                                                                                     
 403          }                                                                                                         
 404      }                                                                                                             
 405                                                                                                                    
 406      /**                                                                                                           
 407       * This method reads the data from the database, analyzes and prepares it for                                 
 408       * the charts. This will be called from a background task, so there must not be                               
 409       * any UI access. #updateChartsInUIThread and #renderCharts will be automatically called after this method.   
 410       */                                                                                                           
 411      protected abstract ChartsData refreshInBackground(ChartsHost chartsHost, DBHandler db, GBDevice device);      
 412                                                                                                                    
 413      /**                                                                                                           
 414       * Triggers the actual (re-) rendering of the chart.                                                          
 415       * Always called from the UI thread.                                                                          
 416       */                                                                                                           
 417      protected abstract void renderCharts();                                                                       
 418                                                                                                                    
 419      protected DefaultChartsData<LineData> refresh(GBDevice gbDevice, List<? extends ActivitySample> samples) {    
 420  //        Calendar cal = GregorianCalendar.getInstance();                                                         
 421  //        cal.clear();                                                                                            
 422          TimestampTranslation tsTranslation = new TimestampTranslation();

 427                                                                                                                    
 428          LOG.info("" + getTitle() + ": number of samples:" + samples.size());

 442              List<Entry> heartrateEntries = hr ? new ArrayList<Entry>(numEntries) : null;                          

 443              int lastHrSampleIndex = -1;                                                                           
 444                                                                                                                    
 445              for (int i = 0; i < numEntries; i++) {                                                                
 446                  ActivitySample sample = samples.get(i);                                                           
 447                  int type = sample.getKind();                                                                      
 448                  int ts = tsTranslation.shorten(sample.getTimestamp());                                            
 449                                                                                                                    
 450  //                System.out.println(ts);

 461  //                }

 464                                                                                                                    
 465                  float value = movement;                                                                           
 466                  switch (type) {                                                                                   
 467                      case ActivityKind.TYPE_DEEP_SLEEP:                                                            
 468                          if (last_type != type) { //FIXME: this is ugly but it works (repeated in each case)       
 469                              deepSleepEntries.add(createLineEntry(0, ts - 1));                                     
 470                                                                                                                    
 471                              lightSleepEntries.add(createLineEntry(0, ts));

 473                              activityEntries.add(createLineEntry(0, ts));                                          
 474                          }

 476                          break;

 478                          if (last_type != type) {                                                                  
 479                              lightSleepEntries.add(createLineEntry(0, ts - 1));                                    
 480                                                                                                                    
 481                              deepSleepEntries.add(createLineEntry(0, ts));                                         
 482                              notWornEntries.add(createLineEntry(0, ts));                                           
 483                              activityEntries.add(createLineEntry(0, ts));                                          
 484                          }                                                                                         
 485                          lightSleepEntries.add(createLineEntry(value, ts));                                        
 486                          break;                                                                                    
 487                      case ActivityKind.TYPE_NOT_WORN:

 493                              activityEntries.add(createLineEntry(0, ts));                                          
 494                          }

 496                          break;                                                                                    
 497                      default:

 512                  }                                                                                                 
 513 -                if (hr && isValidHeartRateValue(sample.getHeartRate())) {                                         
 514 +                if (hr && sample.getKind() != ActivityKind.TYPE_NOT_WORN && isValidHeartRateValue(sample.getHeartR🔵
 515                      if (lastHrSampleIndex > -1 && ts - lastHrSampleIndex > 1800*HeartRateUtils.MAX_HR_MEASUREMENTS🔵
 516                          heartrateEntries.add(createLineEntry(0, lastHrSampleIndex + 1));                          
 517                          heartrateEntries.add(createLineEntry(0, ts - 1));                                         
 518                      }                                                                                             
 519                                                                                                                    
 520                      heartrateEntries.add(createLineEntry(sample.getHeartRate(), ts));                             
 521                      lastHrSampleIndex = ts;

 550

 552              List<ILineDataSet> lineDataSets = new ArrayList<>();

 554              lineDataSets.add(activitySet);

 556              lineDataSets.add(deepSleepSet);

 558              lineDataSets.add(lightSleepSet);                                                                      
 559              LineDataSet notWornSet = createDataSet(notWornEntries, akNotWorn.color, "Not worn");                  
 560              lineDataSets.add(notWornSet);                                                                         
 561                                                                                                                    
 562              if (hr && heartrateEntries.size() > 0) {                                                              
 563                  LineDataSet heartrateSet = createHeartrateSet(heartrateEntries, "Heart Rate");

 569  //            chart.setDescription(getString(R.string.sleep_activity_date_range, dateStringFrom, dateStringTo));

 573          }                                                                                                         
 574                                                                                                                    
 575          IAxisValueFormatter xValueFormatter = new SampleXLabelFormatter(tsTranslation);                           
 576          return new DefaultChartsData(lineData, xValueFormatter);                                                  
 577      }

 579      protected boolean isValidHeartRateValue(int value) {                                                          
 580          return value > HeartRateUtils.MIN_HEART_RATE_VALUE && value < HeartRateUtils.MAX_HEART_RATE_VALUE;        
 581      }

 600      protected LineDataSet createDataSet(List<Entry> values, Integer color, String label) {                        
 601          LineDataSet set1 = new LineDataSet(values, label);                                                        
 602          set1.setColor(color);                                                                                     
 603  //        set1.setDrawCubic(true);                                                                                
 604  //        set1.setCubicIntensity(0.2f);                                                                           
 605          set1.setDrawFilled(true);                                                                                 
 606          set1.setDrawCircles(false);                                                                               
 607  //        set1.setLineWidth(2f);                                                                                  
 608  //        set1.setCircleSize(5f);                                                                                 
 609          set1.setFillColor(color);                                                                                 
 610          set1.setFillAlpha(255);                                                                                   
 611          set1.setDrawValues(false);                                                                                
 612  //        set1.setHighLightColor(Color.rgb(128, 0, 255));                                                         
 613  //        set1.setColor(Color.rgb(89, 178, 44));                                                                  
 614          set1.setValueTextColor(CHART_TEXT_COLOR);                                                                 
 615          set1.setAxisDependency(YAxis.AxisDependency.LEFT);                                                        
 616          return set1;                                                                                              
 617      }
