 640      protected RefreshTask createRefreshTask(String task, Context context) {                                       
 641          return new RefreshTask(task, context);                                                                    
 642      }                                                                                                             
 643                                                                                                                    
 644      public class RefreshTask extends DBAccess {                                                                   
 645          private ChartsData chartsData;                                                                            
 646                                                                                                                    
 647          public RefreshTask(String task, Context context) {                                                        
 648              super(task, context);                                                                                 
 649          }                                                                                                         
 650                                                                                                                    
 651          @Override                                                                                                 
 652          protected void doInBackground(DBHandler db) {                                                             
 653              ChartsHost chartsHost = getChartsHost();                                                              
 654              if (chartsHost != null) {                                                                             
 655                  chartsData = refreshInBackground(chartsHost, db, chartsHost.getDevice());                         
 656              } else {                                                                                              
 657                  cancel(true);                                                                                     
 658              }                                                                                                     
 659          }                                                                                                         
 660                                                                                                                    
 661          @Override                                                                                                 
 662          protected void onPostExecute(Object o) {                                                                  
 663              super.onPostExecute(o);                                                                               
 664              FragmentActivity activity = getActivity();                                                            
 665              if (activity != null && !activity.isFinishing() && !activity.isDestroyed()) {                         
 666                  updateChartsnUIThread(chartsData);                                                                
 667                  renderCharts();                                                                                   
 668              } else {                                                                                              
 669                  LOG.info("Not rendering charts because activity is not available anymore");                       
 670              }                                                                                                     
 671          }                                                                                                         
 672      }                                                                                                             
 673                                                                                                                    
 674      protected abstract void updateChartsnUIThread(ChartsData chartsData);                                         
 675                                                                                                                    
 676      /**                                                                                                           
 677       * Returns true if the date was successfully shifted, and false if the shift                                  
 678       * was ignored, e.g. when the to-value is in the future.                                                      
 679       *                                                                                                            
 680       * @param from                                                                                                
 681       * @param to                                                                                                  
 682       */                                                                                                           
 683      public boolean setDateRange(Date from, Date to) {                                                             
 684          if (from.compareTo(to) > 0) {                                                                             
 685              throw new IllegalArgumentException("Bad date range: " + from + ".." + to);                            
 686          }                                                                                                         
 687          Date now = new Date();                                                                                    
 688          if (to.after(now)) {                                                                                      
 689              return false;                                                                                         
 690          }                                                                                                         
 691          setStartDate(from);                                                                                       
 692          setEndDate(to);                                                                                           
 693          return true;                                                                                              
 694      }                                                                                                             
 695                                                                                                                    
 696      protected void updateDateInfo(Date from, Date to) {                                                           
 697          if (from.equals(to)) {                                                                                    
 698              getChartsHost().setDateInfo(DateTimeUtils.formatDate(from));                                          
 699          } else {                                                                                                  
 700              getChartsHost().setDateInfo(DateTimeUtils.formatDateRange(from, to));                                 
 701          }                                                                                                         
 702      }                                                                                                             
 703                                                                                                                    
 704      protected List<? extends ActivitySample> getSamples(DBHandler db, GBDevice device) {                          
 705          int tsStart = getTSStart();                                                                               
 706          int tsEnd = getTSEnd();                                                                                   
 707          List<ActivitySample> samples = (List<ActivitySample>) getSamples(db, device, tsStart, tsEnd);             
 708          ensureStartAndEndSamples(samples, tsStart, tsEnd);                                                        
 709  //        List<ActivitySample> samples2 = new ArrayList<>();                                                      
 710  //        int min = Math.min(samples.size(), 10);                                                                 
 711  //        int min = Math.min(samples.size(), 10);                                                                 
 712  //        for (int i = 0; i < min; i++) {                                                                         
 713  //            samples2.add(samples.get(i));                                                                       
 714  //        }                                                                                                       
 715  //        return samples2;                                                                                        
 716          return samples;                                                                                           
 717      }                                                                                                             
 718                                                                                                                    
 719      protected void ensureStartAndEndSamples(List<ActivitySample> samples, int tsStart, int tsEnd) {               
 720          if (samples == null || samples.isEmpty()) {                                                               
 721              return;                                                                                               
 722          }                                                                                                         
 723          ActivitySample lastSample = samples.get(samples.size() - 1);                                              
 724          if (lastSample.getTimestamp() < tsEnd) {                                                                  
 725              samples.add(createTrailingActivitySample(lastSample, tsEnd));                                         
 726          }                                                                                                         
 727                                                                                                                    
 728          ActivitySample firstSample = samples.get(0);                                                              
 729          if (firstSample.getTimestamp() > tsStart) {                                                               
 730              samples.add(createTrailingActivitySample(firstSample, tsStart));                                      
 731          }                                                                                                         
 732      }                                                                                                             
 733                                                                                                                    
 734      private ActivitySample createTrailingActivitySample(ActivitySample referenceSample, int timestamp) {          
 735          TrailingActivitySample sample = new TrailingActivitySample();                                             
 736          if (referenceSample instanceof AbstractActivitySample) {                                                  
 737              AbstractActivitySample reference = (AbstractActivitySample) referenceSample;                          
 738              sample.setUserId(reference.getUserId());                                                              
 739              sample.setDeviceId(reference.getDeviceId());                                                          
 740              sample.setProvider(reference.getProvider());                                                          
 741          }                                                                                                         
 742          sample.setTimestamp(timestamp);                                                                           
 743          return sample;                                                                                            
 744      }                                                                                                             
 745                                                                                                                    
 746      private int getTSEnd() {                                                                                      
 747          return toTimestamp(getEndDate());                                                                         
 748      }                                                                                                             
 749                                                                                                                    
 750      private int getTSStart() {                                                                                    
 751          return toTimestamp(getStartDate());                                                                       
 752      }                                                                                                             
 753                                                                                                                    
 754      private int toTimestamp(Date date) {                                                                          
 755          return (int) ((date.getTime() / 1000));                                                                   
 756      }

 759          private final T data;

 761                                                                                                                    
 762          public DefaultChartsData(T data, IAxisValueFormatter xValueFormatter) {                                   
 763              this.xValueFormatter = xValueFormatter;                                                               
 764              this.data = data;                                                                                     
 765          }                                                                                                         
 766                                                                                                                    
 767          public IAxisValueFormatter getXValueFormatter() {                                                         
 768              return xValueFormatter;                                                                               
 769          }                                                                                                         
 770                                                                                                                    
 771          public T getData() {                                                                                      
 772              return data;                                                                                          
 773          }                                                                                                         
 774      }

 776      protected static class SampleXLabelFormatter implements IAxisValueFormatter {                                 
 777          private final TimestampTranslation tsTranslation;                                                         
 778          SimpleDateFormat annotationDateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("HH:mm");                                    
 779  //        SimpleDateFormat dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm");                                 
 780          Calendar cal = GregorianCalendar.getInstance();                                                           
 781                                                                                                                    
 782          public SampleXLabelFormatter(TimestampTranslation tsTranslation) {                                        
 783              this.tsTranslation = tsTranslation;                                                                   
 784                                                                                                                    
 785          }                                                                                                         
 786          // TODO: this does not work. Cannot use precomputed labels                                                
 787          @Override                                                                                                 
 788          public String getFormattedValue(float value, AxisBase axis) {                                             
 789              cal.clear();                                                                                          
 790              int ts = (int) value;                                                                                 
 791              cal.setTimeInMillis(tsTranslation.toOriginalValue(ts) * 1000L);                                       
 792              Date date = cal.getTime();                                                                            
 793              String dateString = annotationDateFormat.format(date);                                                
 794              return dateString;                                                                                    
 795          }                                                                                                         
 796      }                                                                                                             
 797                                                                                                                    
 798      protected static class PreformattedXIndexLabelFormatter implements IAxisValueFormatter {                      
 799          private ArrayList<String> xLabels;                                                                        
 800                                                                                                                    
 801          public PreformattedXIndexLabelFormatter(ArrayList<String> xLabels) {                                      
 802              this.xLabels = xLabels;                                                                               
 803                                                                                                                    
 804          }                                                                                                         
 805          @Override                                                                                                 
 806          public String getFormattedValue(float value, AxisBase axis) {                                             
 807              int index = (int) value;                                                                              
 808              if (xLabels == null || index >= xLabels.size()) {                                                     
 809                  return String.valueOf(value);                                                                     
 810              }                                                                                                     
 811              return xLabels.get(index);                                                                            
 812          }                                                                                                         
 813      }                                                                                                             
 814                                                                                                                    
 815      /**                                                                                                           
 816       * Awkward class that helps in translating long timestamp                                                     
 817       * values to float (sic!) values. It basically rebases all                                                    
 818       * timestamps to a base (the very first) timestamp value.                                                     
 819       *                                                                                                            
 820       * It does this so that the large timestamp values can be used                                                
 821       * floating point values, where the mantissa is just 24 bits.                                                 
 822       */                                                                                                           
 823      protected static class TimestampTranslation {                                                                 
 824          private int tsOffset = -1;                                                                                
 825                                                                                                                    
 826          public int shorten(int timestamp) {                                                                       
 827              if (tsOffset == -1) {                                                                                 
 828                  tsOffset = timestamp;                                                                             
 829                  return 0;                                                                                         
 830              }                                                                                                     
 831              return timestamp - tsOffset;                                                                          
 832          }                                                                                                         
 833                                                                                                                    
 834          public int toOriginalValue(int timestamp) {                                                               
 835              if (tsOffset == -1) {                                                                                 
 836                  return timestamp;                                                                                 
 837              }                                                                                                     
 838              return timestamp + tsOffset;                                                                          
 839          }                                                                                                         
 840      }                                                                                                             
 841  }
